prerequisites.p: Before you can connect to our website, you will need to:

ul.li: Install and be familiar with a web browser like Microsoft Internet Explorer or Netscape Navigator or a File Transfer Protocol (FTP) client.
Connect to the Internet via an Internet Service Provider (ISP). SIL is does not provide this service for the general public.
Understand what the SIL Intranet is for.

thingsToDo.p: Here are some things to do to get connected:
thingsToDo.step: Start your browser and enter this universal resource locator (url), http://intranet.sil.org/ in its address box then press the <Enter> key or click Connect now!
